name: PIXIE BUBBLES-FAIRY BLEND BATT-FIBER ART BATT SET TO SPIN OR FELT- MERINO WOOL - 4.5 OZ
description:
Fresh off the carder, Fairy Blend Batts! These batts are carefully carded by hand from only the finest fibers, creating gorgeous one of a kind colorways that are a treat to spin or felt. Made with a base of super soft hand dyed Merino Wool and plenty of fun extras like silk and sparkle! 
Fairy Blend Batts are double carded for nice smooth spin-ability.

**Fairy Blend Batts** 
***by Greasemoth*** 
set of three hand carded fiber art batts 
TOTAL WEIGHT: 4.2 ounces 
FIBER: Merino Wool (21.5 micron), kid mohair, silk noil, Fairy Floss sparkles (angelina+firestar) 
COLORWAY: "Pixie Bubbles" - Light peachy pinks, cotton candy pinks, pale purples, and a little light blue with glimmering silk and sparkle

name: FAIRY FLOSS - A HANDFUL OF FIBER ART FAIRY SPARKLES TO SPIN OR FELT
description:
Need some sparkles?!!! Once you use Fairy Floss, you will be totally hooked! Perfect for carding into art batts, adding to wet felting, needle felting, and nuno projects, and spinning straight into your hand-spun art yarns. 
Let these artisan sparkle fiber blends revolutionize your crafting! Fairy Floss comes in gorgeous complex colorways and is packaged in perfect convenient portions. 
Try them all!

If you love these funky fresh colorways, be sure to grab the ones you want before they're gone because they may never appear out of the Greasemoth Dye Cauldron ever again!!! Fairy Floss colors are always rotating...Is there a color you have been wishing for? Let me know and I may just make it happen. :)

â™¥ Use Fairy Floss in your spinning and felting projects. A little goes a long way!!! One pack of these highly lustrous fibers is enough to sparkle-ify 2-5 batts or skeins of yarn. Blend it into art batts and rolags, or mix in by handpicking. You can also slowly introduce a few sparkle fibers at a time to your yarn as you are spinning.

*** Fairy Floss sparkle fiber*** 
WEIGHT: 1 gram 
FIBER: many shades of handpainted firestar and angelina 
COLORWAY: various rotating one of a kind colorways...see color chart.

name: SNAPDRAGON - MERINO WOOL TOP - SPIN OR FELT - 4 OZ BRAID
description:
Behold, fresh from the Dye Cauldron, 4 ounce braids of super soft Merino Wool Top! 
Soft yummy wool in eye popping colors that spins up like butter! Great for felters too. ;) 
If you love these funky fresh colorways, be sure to grab the ones you want before they're gone because they may never appear out of the Greasemoth Dye Cauldron ever again!!!

** Cauldron Dyed Roving** 
***by Greasemoth*** 
WEIGHT: 4 ounces 
FIBER: Merino Wool Top, 21.5 micron 
COLORWAY:"Snapdragon" - vibrant and exciting combination of mossy greens and blues, chartreuse and bright coral
